law.catch_line: Road system and grading of lots necessary prior to sale of lots.
law.text: No lots or property shall be sold which are primarily to be used for recreation and retirement use, unless the road system and grading to all such lots are completed in such a manner as to allow a full and complete ingress and egress.
law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 316, sec. 7, effective June 17, 1978.
